Package adress.data

Class AddressBook

java.lang.Object
adress.data.AddressBook
public class AddressBook extends Object
The AddressBook class manages a list of AddressEntry objects. It supports operations such as adding entries, deleting entries, searching for entries, and loading entries from a file.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    void
    addAddressEntry(AddressEntry newEntry)
    Adds a new AddressEntry to the address book if it is not duplicated.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AddressBook getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the AddressBook class.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of AddressBook

    • addAddressEntry

      public void addAddressEntry(AddressEntry newEntry)
      Adds a new AddressEntry to the address book if it is not duplicated. The address book is sorted after adding the new entry.
      Parameters:
      newEntry - the AddressEntry to add

    • addAdressEntriesFromFile

      public void addAdressEntriesFromFile()
      Prompts the user to enter a file name and adds address entries from the specified file. Only entries that pass validation checks are added to the address book.

    • searchAddressEntry

      public ArrayList<AddressEntry> searchAddressEntry()
      Searches for address entries by last name or the first letters of the last name. Prompts the user for input and displays the search results.
      Returns:
      a list of AddressEntry objects that match the search query

    • deleteAddressEntry

      public void deleteAddressEntry()
      Deletes an address entry from the address book. Prompts the user to select an entry from search results and confirm the deletion.

    • showAddressBook

      public void showAddressBook()
      Displays all address entries in the address book.

    • getADDRESS_ENTRY_LIST

      public ArrayList<AddressEntry> getADDRESS_ENTRY_LIST()
      Gets the list of address entries in the address book.
      Returns:
      the list of AddressEntry objects

    • generateAddressEntryFromUserInput

      public AddressEntry generateAddressEntryFromUserInput()
      Prompts the user for input and generates a new AddressEntry object based on the provided data.
      Returns:
      a new AddressEntry object
